pages.text: Motorboats need 3x3 free space to pathfind to a given location, in addition to a supporting fluid or solid block. Motorboats will avoid downward bubble columns but will freely path through upwards bubble columns.

Motorboats will try to cycle through the programmed destinations in order. Their pathfinding range between one destination and another is about 200 blocks; use buoys to extend their range. With some $(l:https://www.reddit.com/r/feedthebeast/comments/1pw83jm/cargo_boats_devlog_motorboats_can_navigate_to/)clever buoy placement and use of soul sand bubble columns and drops$(/l), you can even have boats go up and down automatically as well. In fact, $(l:https://www.reddit.com/r/feedthebeast/comments/1qgqi3a/cargo_boats_dev_update_motorboats_can_transport/)you can even have motorboats go automatically through stuff like nether portals too.$(/l)
